DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare a weight reduction programme with and without a maintenance programme in patients with severe obesity.
DOC.criteria: BMI 35 kg/m2 or more Age 1865 years Type 1 diabetes Major alcohol problem Acute psychic disease, eating behavior, pregnancy, severe disease (cancer, unstable coronary disease, severe liver or kidney disease), or the patient has been in this treatment within the past 5 years
